intro: Sayeria polysema, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its compact rosette growth habit and showy, velvety flowers. The leaves are typically heart-shaped and have a smooth, waxy texture. Sayeria polysema is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
